address: 388 Carlaw Avenue, Toronto, Ontario M4M 2T4 Canada
description: 60 ft high, 12,000 square feet of indoor climbing gym area. Colorful and friendly! The Rock Oasis is a great place to climb in Toronto! FEATURES • 15,000 square feet of climbing surface • Colourful walls with seamless smearable texture • Walls with a wide variety of angles • Technical outdoor style route setting • Lots of bouldering • Fun people work and climb here TOP ROPE CLIMBING The first time you visit The Rock Oasis you must fill in our climbing registration and liability waiver. If you do not know how to tie in and belay, please see the New Climber page. For experienced climbers who know how to tie in and belay, you will be asked to pass a top rope belay certification. We will confirm that you know how to tie into the rope and that you are a safe belayer. This process is for everyone's safety and therefore there is no charge for this service. LEAD CLIMBING If you want to lead climb at The Rock Oasis then you must take our lead climbing course or be an experienced lead climber. Experienced lead climbers must make an appointment to take a lead test. A $25 fee will apply as follows: either 1) refunded if climber is a safe lead climber and lead belayer or 2) 1/2 hour refresher if climber demonstrates 95% of required skills or 3) partial payment towards lead climbing course. Whatever your climbing goals, we’ve got you covered with a variety of climbing surfaces, training equipment, classes, on-site gear store and yoga. With walls towering from 25 to 60 feet, we offer top roping, leading, auto belays, and bouldering for all ages and climbing levels, from beginner to expert. In addition to climbing, both Stone Summit locations feature an extensive fitness center with a full range of equipment and group classes including yoga and Pilates. We have everything you need to climb to new heights and get fit. Come be a part of our climbing and fitness community!

name: Wall Crawler Rock Club

name: ESCALADE ROCK CLIMBING

Climbers of all levels will find climbs to challenge their skills. Escalade is also the perfect place for birthday parties, lock-ins or other group activities. As a family activity, indoor rock climbing is in a league of its own. There are few sports where every member of the family can participate in at the same time. Children and parents get a sense of excitement and accomplishment from their very first climb! Unlike many active sports, there's no "learning hump" to cross before it really becomes fun. No experience is necessary and everyone can climb at their own pace.

This quality makes it as challenging as any outdoor climbing surfaces within the Columbia area. Scroggs Peak Climbing pass - $34/year (must attend and pass belay certification class prior to purchasing pass). 4 standard ropes and a lead climb course. Bouldering wall available as well. name: Wright State University Outdoor Resource Center Climbing Gym
address: 3640 Colonel Glenn Highway; Student Union #037, Dayton, Ohio 45435-0001
description: A 23-foot tall wall for roped climbing (top and lead) and bouldering; a 14-foot tall dedicated bouldering wall which includes a spray wall, a peg board, and a hang board; and a variety of other training tools. Both walls have a natural feel which simulates real rock. The tall wall features several cracks which can be used to train anywhere from crimps to hand/foot jamming, an arete, slab, and a variety of overhang possibilities. The bouldering wall features some great natural holds from jugs to crimps and pinches. Both walls feature numerous natural pockets which are often incorporated into routes and problems, and can be used for traversing. The Climbing Gym at Wright State has a great and welcoming community that strives for education, inclusiveness, and fun. Routes/problems are added and rotated weekly. The Climbing Gym also offers numerous programs from belay training, climber education classes, and route setting training to trips, competitions, and speaker series/conferences. The Climbing Gym is the home of the Wright State University Climbing Club and Climbing Team. The use of the wall is open to current students and Recreation Center members for free. Guests can pay a $5.00 fee for a day-use pass which grants them access to the climbing gym, fitness center, pool, and other fitness/recreation studios. Membership options are also available. The Climbing Gym is a facility of the Outdoor Resource Center at WSU, which offers trips, gear rentals, and clinics for an affordable price. Wright State also co-hosts The Adventure Summit and Adventure Speaker Series on alternating years.

name: Outdoor Pursuit Center at Miami University
description: 2500 square feet of indoor rock climbing, measures 40' tall by 44' wide, features bouldering, top-rope and lead routes and a bouldering cave, 30' roof, a flake system, and a buttress which creates, dihedrals, aretes, slabs, and overhanging routes. 8 top ropes, lead climbing, roof, and a freestanding bouldering cave. Nicros designed 'natural feature' climbing gym; 37 ft at highest point; includes 25 ft rappel platform; 37 foot crack; and a simulated ice wall.

name: Kendall Cliffs
description: Nicros designed gym with a combination of textured plywood and 'natural' rock surfaces. 7,000 square feet of climbing surface with a peak height of 35 feet, plus a bouldering area.

name: Paddle & Climb
description: At Paddle & Climb, we’re all about an active lifestyle and promoting our love for the outdoors. New for 2020 is our online shop offering items from Costa Del Mar Patagonia, Prana, Quiksilver, Bula and Neff! We Check back soon to see more brands as we add them online. In addition to shopping online, visit our shop located on Water Street in beautiful downtown Sandusky, we feature a full retail shop that’s filled with goods derived from our passion, perfect for living the Paddle & Climb life including Patagonia, Prana, Billabong, Stand Up Paddleboards, Skateboards and Sunski Sunglasses. Just steps away from the waters of Sandusky Bay, we encourage you to rent a kayak or stand up paddle board. Because we want you to experience what makes us love northern Ohio. Want to stay on solid ground? Hook up your harness and climb to the top of our 32ft indoor rock climbing wall, the first of any kind in the Sandusky, Ohio area. See you out there!

name: Shaker Rocks
address: 3377 Warrensville Center Road, Shaker Heights, OH 44122
description: 14,000 square feet of climbing, including top rope, bouldering, auto belays, and a dedicated lead area and speed wall. A state-of-the-art rock climbing gymoffering a unique opportunity for sport, camaraderie and civic pride. Experience the joy of success, set goals, take risks, fail big, and reflect in a safe and supportive environment. Founded upon the values of kindness, generosity, community building, and environmental stewardship.

name: University of Toledo
description: Small indoor climbing top-roping wall located in the Rec Center.

name: Climbing High
description: Indoor Rock Climbing, Outdoor Education courses, and Professional Guiding.

name: YSU Indoor Rock Climbing Gym
description: 53 ft free form wall with an all natural feel....Cracks, Crimps, Overhang, and a Killer Staff. Many new boulder problems weekly and some strong regulars. 6 top ropes and 3 different elevations from Beginner to Advanced. 3 Sport lines with possibility's of multi-pitch practice. All rentals and usage is free for students or friends of students.

name: Blocworks Climbing Community
description: Oklahoma's premier bouldering gym relentless about community and climbing. Read through our blogs to know more. Come join the fun!

name: Threshold Climbing Gym
address: 6000 Westlake Memorial Parkway, Oklahoma City, Oklahoma 73142
description: Our gym features over 20,000 square feet of textured climbing walls with angles for all abilities. We have bouldering for days, including a competition wall and a lead climb arch to round our our 32 dedicated top rope stations. Enough space for the young, old, experienced and newbies! A fully stocked pro-shop with brands like Arcteryx, Black Diamond,Kize and Petzel. We also have a full fitness room with cardio, free weights and machines. Come see our training rig complete with rings, peg board, finger boards and enough monkey bars for all the training pull-ups! Also included is a full yoga schedule with our amazing 200+ hour certified yoga instructors. We also offer personal training whether it's for climbing, fitness or just to have a belay buddy. Make sure and check out our 15 meter speed wall and test your technique with some of the fastest speed climbers in the region. All of our instructors are certified climbing instructors through the AMGA and are ready to teach climbing knots, movement and even crack climbing! Come see us, we can't wait to have you as part of our climbing family!

name: OBU Recreation and Wellness Center (RAWC)
description: 29ft tall indoor climbing wall with 9 top rope options as well as bouldering section. Wall is reset once a year in the summer.

name: Colvin Center (Oklahoma State University)
description: Designed with 9 sections offering multiple climbers to ascend at once. The wall is 24' high with two cracks and three roof sections. Additionally, we offer 150 square feet of climbing space in our bouldering cave.

name: Southern Oregon University Outdoor Program
description: Spanning two floors of the SOU Student Recreation Center, the Climbing Center provides SOU students, faculty, staff, and community members a place to learn to climb, tackle new challenges, and build a community of climbers. At 44 feet tall, the climbing wall is the tallest from Eugene, OR to Sacramento, CA. It's also the tallest wall from Ashland to Japan (not a lot of climbing walls in the Pacific Ocean ;). Climbers can participate in bouldering, top-roping, and lead climbing during open climbing hours, and attend special climbing events.

name: Bend Rock Gym

name: OSU Recreational Sports Indoor Climbing Center

description: 9,000 sq ft of climbing walls with aretes, roofs, overhangs, bouldering caves, lots of low angles, and leadable routes.

Our building has a unique open floor plan with extensive community space, fitness/weight training areas, yoga room, and dedicated climbing specific training zones.

Beyond bouldering, ASCEND offers roped climbing on a 24-foot-tall wall featuring 20 climbing stations with a mix of auto-belays and top-ropes. Cross- training is also a big part of ASCEND, so be sure to explore climbing-specific training and fitness equipment or drop in on one of our yoga or fitness classes. In addition to climbing, fitness, and yoga, visitors can also enjoy use of child watch services, concessions, locker rooms with showers, and numerous spaces to relax, study, or work.

name: FA Climbing & Fitness & Fitness

description: FA Climbing & Fitness & Fitness opened its first location outside of Illinois in Pittsburgh’s Station Square on Saturday, Feb. 26. The new 30,000-square-foot facility will house 10,000 square feet of bouldering space, 12,000 square feet of yoga and fitness space, locker rooms with showers and key code lockers, and a climbing gear pro shop, wrapped in the unique architecture and history of the Freight House.

name: The Gravity Vault Radnor
address: 175 King of Prussia Rd, Radnor, PA 19087
description: The Gravity Vault Radnor Indoor Rock Gym has something for everyone from beginners and children to advanced climbers! We’re located in the greater Philadelphia area minutes from King of Prussia and Conshohocken. This 16,000 Sq. Ft. state-of-the-art climbing facility features everything from 100+ top roping, bouldering (+ Moon Board), lead climbing and even 7 auto-belays. If you are new to climbing, The Gravity Vault Radnor can help you get started with a staff lead climbing sessions. We also offer belay classes for those who are looking to learn the art of handling the ropes themselves. Don’t forget to ask about the many activities we have for kids, such as after school classes, summer camps, and birthday parties!

name: Coastal Climbing

Boasting 3,000 square feet of bouldering surfaces, Coastal Climbing is the place to learn how to climb or refine your technique , power and endurance. Coastal Climbing is conveniently located in the heart of Charleston and the facility is fully air conditioned. In addition to climbing there is fitness equipment, yoga, and slacklining. The routes are all monochromatic (based on climbing hold colors) and easy to follow.

name: The Climbing Wall

Routes range from 5.5-5.13 with a variety of terrain including slab and overhang. The Climbing Wall is also a great place to learn climbing skills. Classes range from How to Belay to Advanced Rescues. Our slackline park offers line configurations up to 70 feet.

name: BlocHaven

name: Greenwood Family YMCA

name: Climb@Blue Ridge

name: Black Hills Basecamp
description: Built by climbers for the Black Hills community, Basecamp provides a humble, high-quality bouldering gym for climbers to train, start projects, meet partners, and begin new adventures. We offer ~45 consistently rotated routes of all levels, professional route setting, a fitness room with free weights and cardio equipment, a training wall with a MoonBoard and Tension Board, a Treadwall (vertical treadmill for climbers), group events (for businesses, birthdays, etc.) and excellent customer service. Come climb with us!

We love helping new climbers learn and offer several introductory classes. In addition, we are a full- service gym with amenities like cardio equipment and weights, yoga studio, group fitness classes, expert instructors, and a fully-stocked gear shop. We are just steps away from the Crystal City metro stop and part of The Crystal City Shops, which is home a compilation of contemporary restaurants, celebrated chefs and cool cafes – all perfect for après climb. Comment - All Earth Treks locations (Rockville, Columbia, Timonium and Hamden) are now Movement.

name: Roca Norte Outdoor Climbing Gym
description: The North region of Puerto Rico encloses an incredible marine geologic history back to 30 million years old. Roca Norte is located in a unique topographic landscape called "mogotes", which provide spectacular cliffs to climb and scenic views. After hurricane María (2017), 21 Climb and Tour personnel Kenneth Irizarry, Marianela Mercado, and local veteran climber Jorge Rodríguez, created Roca Norte for locals and visitors to enjoy this newly added climbing spot in our backyard, with 39 routes (and still bolting). The hurricane cleared all the vegetation and made possible for us to prepare this unique climbing spot who was hidden all this time at our lands. Probably the most common climbing scenario is entering a public land or park, having all your gear and food with you and start hiking to get to those walls. Roca Norte is very unique especially because most of what is common in climbing is not common here. First, this is a private land who welcomes everyone from all parts of the world, but with a reservation to maintain the area in nice environment. This is the home based crag! own by climbers like you, known by locals and visitors as the climbing heaven cause you can CAMP, EAT and DRINK here, climb from easy to more difficult ones, the rock wall is just at a few steps from your parking, it has a cozy rest area with hammocks and chairs under a beautiful shaded panoramic area. Our facilities include full bathroom with shower. Parking is limited, is always better carpooling. Second we offer different climbing services for experienced and non experience people including children from renting gear for those who are travelling, to guided climbing for those non experienced, belay service for climbers who don't have a climbing partner, top ropes set up for those who don't lead yet and entrance day passes for those visiting for a day. Third we also offer other activities or conveniences such as if its Saturday you can see a climbing movie too at 6pm in a perfect relaxed environment/outdoor cinema and in addition we also sell climbing gear, climbing shoes and chalk.

name: ACE CLIMB
address: Rua José Elias Giuliari 109 - Boa Vista, Joinville, - SC, 89205-310, Brazil
description: A data mais especial para ACE CLIMB. 3 de agosto de 2019. Um dia de muita alegria para todos os amantes do esporte em que pudemos inaugurar a mais nova academia de escalada indoor, pela localização até daria para chamar de outdoor. Com vários níveis de dificuldade contando com parede positiva, vertical, negativa e teto, incluindo arestas, diedros e fendas, um menu completo para se poder experimentar o esporte com todas as variações possíveis. Com o objetivo de trazer o público para este esporte tão completo e cheio de desafios, tive o orgulho de construir esta estrutura tão incrível, foram 3 meses de trabalho contínuo dia e noite, o objetivo inicial era inaugurar uma semana antes, que seria meu dia de aniverssário, mas os contra tempos não permitiram nessa data exata, mas sempre lembrarei que a cada aniverssário meu será também o da ACE CLIMB. Venham e aproveitem, treinem o quanto puder, evoluam, ganhem força, resistência, flexibilidade, equilíbrio e deixem a vida fluir por suas veias.

name: Jurapê Centro de Escalada

description: Na Jurapê Escalada contamos com uma parede de 7 metros com 4 top ropes (sistema de segurança com corda), uma área de boulder com inclinações entre 15 e 58º, e uma área com campus board, system wall e aparelhos para treinos de condicionamento. Tanto as vias (top rope) quanto os boulders variam em estilo e graduação procurando oferecer uma experiência completa pra todos escaladores, graças ao trabalho de nossos route setters que criam vias e boulders novos a cada semana.

name: Wolf Mountain
description: Wolf Mountain Indoor Climbing Centre first opened its doors to the public in October 2005 and was based in a small industrial unit in Racecourse Road, Wolverhampton, West Midlands. The Centre was hugely popular and attracted a variety of people. However, the demand for indoor climbing was significantly higher than we had anticipated and therefore prompted the search for larger premises. In December 2009, after months of planning and construction, we relocated and currently operate from what was formerly a local authority swimming pool that now houses some extremely impressive climbing walls. Set in a beautiful location, the Centre boasts excellent facilities and offers a range of adventurous activities. The Centre has top rope, bouldering, abseiling and lead climbing walls. In addition to this, there is an indoor caving system, archery gallery, conference room for hire, designated climbing area for kid's parties and two themed party rooms. Wolf Mountain caters for individuals and groups of all abilities and prides itself on the excellent facilities and committed staff team. For the less energetic visitor or spectator, there is a cafe and several sit down viewing areas. Situated near to the City Centre, Wolf Mountain is easily accessible by public transport and for those choosing to drive, there is ample free car parking provision.

description: Awesome Walls Dublin is one of the largest and most modern indoor climbing centres in Europe. With over 2000m2 of dedicated climbing surface including more than 700m2 of bouldering, 18m lead walls and 200+ climbing routes there really is something fun and challenging for everybody to try. Whether you’re a complete beginner or an experienced rock climbing athlete, you’ll want to come back for more! If you want to try rock climbing then there is no better place than Awesome Walls Climbing Centre Dublin. We provide a safe environment and expert tuition to help you on your way to a fun and exciting future in climbing. Our qualified and experienced staff are always on hand to help you through your climbing experience, from answering your questions on anything climbing related to giving tips and advice on training or pushing your grade. Great bouldering across two floors, competition wall, viewing area and more.

We run regular Adult and Juvenile Courses throughout the year and offer a large array of affordable memberships to suit all climber's budgets. We also offer pay as you go climbing! Our Gecko Club is specially designed for the young climbers of Ireland and they meet 2-3 times weekly at our wall.

By Bike: We love our bikes here at Gravity Climbing Centre and we know what the traffic in Dublin is like. Just to encourage you, we have plenty of bike parking on site and for cycle routes see here: dublincitycycling.ie Public Transport: Luas: We're less than 5 mins walk from the Blackhorse stop on the Luas red line. When you get off cross the canal & walk towards the petrol station. We're in the estate just after the petrol station on the opposite side. name: Dublin Climbing Centre

description: Facilities Over 1000 square meters of lead and top rope and 130 square meters of bouldering with friction coated surfaces. 5 Auto Belays. Our training room contains a Moon board, a 30 degree wall, finger boards, rings, weights and benches for a broad training experience. A small coffee shop provides snacks and drinks so you can relax between climbs. Courses The Dublin Climbing Centre offers climbing courses for all abilities. Induction classes. Two 1.5 hour sessions with one of out qualified Instructors to teach you how to use the Centre Independently. 4 Week Learn To Climb and Learn to Lead courses, Bouldering Coaching. Learn to Belay, Junior Classes and much more. Just give us a call to discuss. We can open at 10 am on weekdays by arrangement and run structured weekly programmes for Schools and other Groups. We also offer the National Indoor Climbing Wall Award Scheme ( NICAS) teaching programme for juniors from 7 years to 17 year old.

name: UNTERWEGS - DAV Kletterzentrum Bremen
description: Ein weißer Fleck auf der Landkarte verschwindet… …nein, nicht in der Antarktis oder im hintersten Himalaya, sondern in der Landschaft der DAV-Kletterhallen. Denn im Nordwesten zwischen Nordsee, Lüneburger Heide und holländischer Grenze war das Angebot an Indoor- Klettermöglichkeiten bislang mager bis nicht vorhanden. Nun begann hier aber bereits im Dezember 2015 eine neue Zeitrechnung mit der Eröffnung des „UNTERWEGS – DAV Kletterzentrum Bremen“ in Bremen. Und das bietet: Klettern auf 1850m2 Wandfläche, innen und außen , Seilklettern und Bouldern, von UIAA-Grad 3 bis 10 In über 180 Routen bei 14 Meter Wandhöhe, für Anfänger und Könner, zum Trainieren oder Schnuppern, allein oder in der Gruppe, Auch fern der Alpen hat das Klettern als Leistungs- und als Breitensport in den vergangenen Jahren massiv an Attraktivität gewonnen. Die Sektion Bremen kommt diesem Bedarf mit dem neuen Kletterzentrum entgegen und bereichert gleichzeitig das Sportangebot in der Region. Die Bremer Halle liegt im sogenannten „Technologiezentrum“ an der Universität Bremen im Osten der Stadt – nicht gerade „downtown“, aber mit Rad, ÖPNV oder Auto bestens zu erreichen. Man muss zugeben, dass das Projekt für die Bremer Sektion nicht einfach zu stemmen war. Es musste Überzeugungsarbeit in der Mitgliederschaft für den Hallenbau geleistet werden, denn von Beginn an war klar, dass solch ein Projekt für eine norddeutsche Sektion in der Größe Bremens eine Mammutaufgabe bedeutet. Aber eine seit vielen Jahren den Hallenbau vorantreibende Arbeitsgruppe und ein - trotz wechselnder Zusammensetzung – dem Projekt wohlgesonnener Vorstand haben im Endeffekt das „dicke Brett“ gemeinsam gebohrt. Und das Ergebnis kann sich umso mehr sehen lassen, die große Nachfrage bei Kursangeboten und die stark steigende Zahl von Neueintritten in die Sektion sprechen für sich. (Aktuelle Mitgliederzahl 4.300). Gute sechs Jahre dauerte es von der ersten Initiative bis zur Eröffnung, bis die 3-Millionen Euro Investition Realität wurde. Den Bauentwurf verantwortete das mit Kletterhallen erfahrene Architekturbüro Gierlinger aus München, die Kletterwände wurden von der Firma T-Wall geliefert und montiert. Als Hallenleiter konnte die Sektion Jonas Loss aus Wetzlar gewinnen, der dort bereits in gleicher Funktion gearbeitet hatte. Nachdem nun im Frühjahr auch die Routen an den Außenwänden geschraubt sind und das umgebende Gelände mit Beachvolleyball-Feld, Slackline und Grillecke „sommerfest“ gestaltet wurden, wird sich das Team der Bremer Hallenleitung nun verstärkt um die Kooperationen mit Schulen, Firmen etc. kümmern, und sicher wird in absehbarer Zeit auch ein Kletterwettbewerb in der Bremer Halle zu sehen sein. Also notiert euch das neue „Highlight im Norden“ und schaut vorbei: UNTERWEGS – DAV Kletterzentrum Bremen Robert-Hooke-Straße 19 28359 Bremen Tel.: 0421 51429053 Mail: hallo@kletterzentrum-bremen.de Web: www.kletterzentrum-bremen.de

name: Beta Boulders Copenhagen South (Sydhavn)

The gym is easy to reach with public transport and has a large free parking on site. It's the most clean and nicest climbing gym in Copenhagen.

name: Aalborg Klatreklub
description: Great climbing club with a very friendly community. Has both lead, auto-belay, top rope and 3 boulder areas. Open 24/7 (if you can get someone to let you in)

name: GAME Streetmekka

name: Boulders Aarhus City

Hallen byder på alt fra slab til tag og er placeret centralt i Aarhus i gå-afstand fra Aarhus Hovedbanegård. Aarhus City Boulderen er en varm og indbydende hal med vægge af bambus og en rigtig hyggeligt café. Du finder massere af brætspil i vores sofa-område, og der er selvfølgelig massere plads til afslapning og gode snakke.

Boulders Sydhavn åbnede i 2007 og har siden været kendt for sit åbne fællesskab og mange arrangementer og konkurrencer. Vi serverer, ligesom i alle vores andre haller, økologisk kaffe, kolde drikke, øl og snacks i caféen, hvor det også er muligt at leje eller købe udstyr som klatresko, kalkposer og kalk.

Odense er notorisk for sit inkluderende og søde fællesskab og har længe været anerkendt som den hyggeligste hal.

The traditional concept of indoor and outdoor climbing walls has been given up and gives way to a central tower which is surrounded by a glass facade. Shaded by a perforated plate it offers an unusual climbing experience with a beautiful view over the surrounding mountains of Brixen. The concept of ventilation makes climbing coolish in summer and comforting in winter. Qualified and passionate instructors help make your climbing dreams a reality. Sign up in advance! description: Fabrique is a community of energetic, motivated and creative people. It is a space where different backgrounds meet to find a perfect life balance. Modern climbing and training facilities and advice from experienced instructors enable members watching climbing as a self-development process. Open co-working space, non-traditional meeting rooms and community events encourage members to share, learn from each other and make better decisions. Our core mission is creating an enjoyable environment full of trust and support, so that you can create and achieve more. There is no best way to do things, but there is one that is best for you. Come and find it at Fabrique. Work. Climb. Live. Be yourself.

name: Scaladream Climbing Club
description: Bouldering gym offering active leisure facilities such us: - Free climbing - Climbing trainings - Events organizing - Climbing trips Lounge zone, tea'slash'coffee, wi-fi & table tennis inside.

name: BONOBO laipiojimo centras
description: In BONOBO climbing center we have both lead climbing and bouldering walls with a variety of angles ranging from positive (slabs) to steep overhangs and the climbing hall has air conditioning as well as natural light most of the time during the day. We also have a training room full of training appliances such as a 2017 Moonboard, a Zlag board, campus and finger boards, a treadmill, dumbbells and a bench for pressing weights. Besides climbing itself we sell (and rent) climbing equipment, tasty sodas and coffee of course.

name: VERTICAL climbing center
description: Vertical is the latest and largest climbing gym in Vilnius. Offering 15m high lead wall, huge bouldering area, spacious training zone, cozy cafe and lots of chillout space. Constantly renewed routes and boulder problems set by top routesetters will suit beginners and professionals, women and men, kids and elderly and anyone in between! Gym has a fresh new showers, changing rooms, bar with cafe, snacks and also small shop of essentials climbing goods. Vertical is easy accessible by public transport as it it just 4 km from city center.

name: Hall Omnisport
address: Rue de Toernich 112, Steinsel, Arlon 6700 Luxembourg
description: 150 m2 indoorklettern.

name: Vladimir Trpovski
address: Lazar Lichenoski 31/2; center, Skopje, North Macedonia
description: Bouldering gym with artificial rock and an area of 130 sq m. Also with two 6m campus boards and a moon board.

name: OU 'Toso Arsov'
description: 9 meters high climbing gym.

name: Gebla Climbing
address: Triq In-Negozju Birkirkara Mriehel, L-Imsida, BKR 3000
description: Gebla is a new indoor bouldering gym in Malta, the first of its kind. Built by the passionate climbing community in Malta, Gebla puts indoor bouldering in Malta on the map.

name: Sliema Scouts Climbing Gym
description: A small wall built in the Sliema Scouts HQ which is open every Thursday from 6pm to 10pm. Users must be members of the Malta Climbing Club. Membership of the MCC is just EUR10 per year, use of the wall is at just EUR3 per session.

name: Aventura
description: Since 2011 Chisinau has a climbing tower with 4 sides 8-10 m of altitude.

name: Chisinau Bouldering Project
description: Bouldering gym in Chisinau. Good problems, very affordable and friendly place. Скалодром в Кишенёве. Отличаня атмосфера. Доступные цены.

name: Beest Boulders
address: Grote marktstraat 26, 2511 BJ, Den Haag, Netherlands
description: In het hart van de stad, aan de Grote Marktstraat, vind je onze nieuwste en grootste boulderhal! Met meer dan 250 boulders bieden wij een ongeëvenaarde ervaring voor zowel beginnende als ervaren boulderaars. Beest Boulders Den Haag Centrum biedt talloze mogelijkheden om deze bouldersport te ontdekken en je klimvaardigheden te verbeteren. Door de centrale ligging van de hal is deze gemakkelijk te bereiken met het openbaar vervoer, de fiets en de auto.

name: De Klimmuur Alkmaar
description: If you want to climb at times other than the scheduled times you need to contact them by phone or mail.

name: Beta Boulder
description: New routs weekly, a fitness area training equipment for climbers, 2x LED Moonboards, hangboards and a campus board.

name: Het Lab
description: New boulder gym in Amsterdam opened in 2017. Part of the Klimmuur group

name: Klimhal Amsterdam
description: De hal beschikt over veel faciliteiten, deskundige begeleiding en is daarnaast goed bereikbaar per auto (gratis parkeerruimte) en openbaar vervoer (station Sloterdijk). De grootste klimhal van de Benelux is 21 meter hoog, heeft een klimmuur oppervlak van maar liefst 2200 m2 en een boulderoppervlak van 250 m2.

name: Klimhal Centraal
description: 15 m height, 1000 m²

name: Monk bouldergym Amsterdam
description: The only bouldering gym in Amsterdam. 500sqm of bouldering space, over 200 problems, with 20 fresh ones weekly. Supernice location, along the IJ river.

name: Mountain Network Amsterdam - Tussen Hemel en Aarde (Between Heaven and Earth)
description: Moved to a new location in 2012. Topsport campus and state of the art climbing centre. Climbing gym hosting the biggest overhang in the Netherlands. Biggest indoor boulder gym in Amsterdam and surroundings. With 3D walls completely constructed out of triangles. Topsport fitness- and training facility with physiotherapy practice, outdoor shop, restaurant and bar with fireplace and floating terrace outside. Beginner classes, intermediate and advanced clinics. Groups and birthday parties are welcome.

name: USC Sport Center Universum
description: It's a small but quiet hall. Some evenings it's a bit more crowded due to the courses. Make an appointment for for an assessment. It takes about 10 minutes.

name: Mountain Network Arnheim
description: Klimcentra in Amsterdam, Arnhem. Dordrecht, Heerenveen en Nieuwegein. Maar ook outdoor locaties in de Ardennen en de Franse Alpen. Beklim samen met ons de top!

name: Monte Cervino
description: De rotsachtige betonnen buitenwand heeft een beklimbaar oppervlak van 1350m2 en is 35 mtr. hoog. Tientallen routes lopen over wrijvingsplaten, via scheuren, loodrechte- en overhangende wanden. Ook in het binnenste van de Monte Cervino gaat je hart sneller kloppen. 1250m2 klimbare wand, vol met routes tussen de 3+ en 8b en tot 27 mtr. hoog. Voor de warming-up en training is er een 'boulderhok’. Natuurlijk zijn er ook kleedkamers, douches, een keuken en een gezellige bar te vinden.

name: Rock Steady
description: 16 m height indoor climbing, 300 sq meters outdoor bouldering, klettersteig & abseil.

name: Revolt Bouldering Gym
description: In our bouldering gym both recreational climbers and climbers at the top level can climb and train hard on new school boulders. Our state-of-the-art climbing walls, built by T-Wall who also realised the Studio Block walls in Germany, will offer new and challenging bouldering problems at all levels.

name: Klimmuur Den Haag - Sport Complex De Uithof
address: Jaap Edenweg 10, Den Haag, 2544 NL Netherlands
description: In een gezellige en veilige omgeving kun je bij ons leren klimmen en helpen we je op weg bij het kennis maken met de sport. Je kunt direct online een introductieles boeken, maar je kunt via de gekleurde menuutjes

name: Steep Part
address: Waldorpstraat 15 - nabij Hollands Spoor, Den Haag, 2521 CA Netherlands
description: In a cozy and safe environment you can learn to climb with us. As a beginner, we help you get started in making acquaintance with mountaineering. You can find a beginners course in four classes, but also a one-time introductory. Children from the age of 8 often celebrate their child's birthday party with us. You can then take a cake yourself, and you can order from us pancakes at the end. And the children go home with a real certificate! children, who often want to climb there is the youth course of four lessons. And then they can move on to our own children. course the more experienced sport climber feels at home with us. Our walls range from side-walls to spectacular roofs and overhangs to a height of twenty meters!

name: Klimkerk Den Helder
address: OLVOO-kerk Den helder Jan in 't Veltstraat 94, Den Helder, Netherlands
description: climbing gym build in an old church, 10 m height.

name: Mountain Network Dordrecht
description: + 1250 sq meters of climbing area with heights of up to 17m, indoor and outdoor bouldering areas.

name: Monk Bouldergym
address: Strijp S / gebouw SBX, Eindhoven, Noord-Brabant, Netherlands
description: 4,5 m height, biggest national bouldering-only gym!

name: Neoliet Eindhoven- Zuid
description: Klimcentrum Neoliet Eindhoven-Zuid is located at the Genneper Parken in the building of Fontys Sport Hogeschool. There is a lead climb wall, rock wall, klettersteig and rope courses. There are about 100 routes from grades 3+ till 7c+. The hight is variable from 11 - 15 meters. Klimcentrum Neoliet Eindhoven-Zuid is per 15 september 2012 open en gevestigd op de Genneper Parken in het gebouw van de Fontys Sport Hogeschool. Er zijn hier uitstekende voorklimwanden, een rotswand, klettersteigs en touwparcouren. Het centrum is bij uitstek geschikt voor het opleiden van klimmers en kader. De gehele ruimte is hiervoor af te huren. Maar juist ook voor een avontuurlijke belevenis zoals onze feestjes en arrangementen. Het centrum beschikt over een groot professioneel restaurant, vergader- en lesruimtes. Er zijn circa 100 routes van 3+ tot en met 7c+. De hoogtes zijn variabel van 11 tot en met een hoogte van 15 meter. Voor elk klimniveau heel veel klimplezier!

name: Arqué
address: J.J. van Deinselaan 20, Enschede, 7541 BR Netherlands
description: 16.5 meters high, 800 m² area.

name: Cube Bouldergym
description: 4,5 m height, only bouldering, ca. 120 boulder problems.

name: Bjoeks
description: 18 m height, 1100 m² area, plus a 37 meter high freestanding outdoor wall/tower of 800 m2. This is the highest dedicated climbing structure in the world. The gym also has an impressive 300 m2 bouldering area.

name: Klimmuur Haarlem
description: In een gezellige en veilige omgeving kun je bij ons leren klimmen en helpen we je op weg bij het kennis maken met de sport. Je kunt direct online een introductieles boeken, maar je kunt via de gekleurde menuutjes

name: Mountain Network Heereveen - Sportstad Heerenveen
address: Abe Lenstra Boulevard 23, Heereveen, 8448 JA Netherlands
description: Klimcentra in Amsterdam, Arnhem. Dordrecht, Heerenveen en Nieuwegein. Maar ook outdoor locaties in de Ardennen en de Franse Alpen. Beklim samen met ons de top!

name: The Climbing Corner
address: In de Cramer 14; 6411 RS, Heerlen, Netherlands
description: An indoor Bouldering centre for everyone. It's simple: get fit by climbing and having a good time, regardless of age, shape or experience. ​ The Climbing Corner brings you over 520 m2 of climbing surface and 120 different bouldering 'problems' for rookies or pros alike. No equipment or previous experience is necessary.

name: Bossche Boulders
description: Opent deuren in voorjaar 2019. Als enthousiaste boulderaars willen wij zoveel mogelijk mensen op een toegankelijke manier met onze sport kennis laten maken.  Boulderen is een super sociale sport en dat willen wij in onze hal benadrukken.

name: Noardwand (Mountain Network)
description: 20 m height.

name: Boulderhal Kunststof
description: Bouldering gym many routes and a nice workout/warming up area. Boulderhal Kunststof is een moderne indoor klimfaciliteit met een gezellige sfeer en een relaxte bar met goede koffie en lekkere biertjes

name: Radium Boulders
description: Boulder hall in an old industrial building. 1700m2 of climbing, along with a well equipped training area, and a very cozy bar. Re-sets are regular, and the setting is fun for all grades.

name: Mountain Network Nieuwegein
description: 16 m height, 1100 m² area.

name: Sportcenter Action
description: Hall of about 400m2 with rope ladder, abseil platform, and more than 50 routes.

name: Beest Boulders Rotterdam
description: De nieuwste boulderhal van Rotterdam met fantastisch uitzicht over de stad! Beest Boulders heeft ruim 220 verschillende boulders verspreid over 4 verdiepingen! Er is genoeg variatie voor ieder niveau. De boulders worden wekelijks ververst zodat er altijd nieuwe boulders zijn om te ontdekken.

name: Steep Part Klimcentrum
description: 1000 m² area; hoogste punt 16,5 meter!, zijn zo'n 80 routes in verschillende moeilijkheidsgraden op de klimwanden uitgezet.

name: Graviton Bouldergym
description: Big bouldergym with a lot of variation in routes and grades.

name: I-vy climbing
description: IVY climbing 1500 m2 climbing walls. Lead; slab to steep overhang, 8 to 20 meters high. Boulder; separate +300 m2 training and bouldering area. Speed, 15 meter wall with Perfect Descent on both runs.

name: Boulderhal Walhalla
description: Boulderhal Walhalla is a nice cosy gym in a cool old factory building. Have a climbing session on the coolest boulder problems, and treat yourself in the bar area.

name: Boulderhal de Campus
description: Bouldergym de Campus is the biggest bouldergym in the Netherlands. With boulders in every grade and a spacious kids aerea, de Campus is a gym for beginner climbers and pro's. After climbing you can get a cup of coffee in the bar earea.

name: Neoliet Tilburg - Sportpark Goirleseweg
description: 14.5 m height, 900 m² area.

name: Boulderhal Sterk
address: Koningin Wilhelminalaan, Utrecht, Utrecht 3527LD The Netherlands
description: There will be 180 boulders and every week they will change new ones. For inquiries check the website or call them.

name: Energiehaven
description: Bouldering hall within the energy harbour, with a patio and windows giving to the canal. Multiple ingenious boulder problems set in a relaxed and open climbing atmosphere. Overhang, roof, slab, and a fully equipped training area!

name: Klimmuur Utrecht
description: 10 m height, extreme new bouldering, very cozy hall.

name: Neoliet
description: Indoor and outdoor artificial wall climbing gym.

name: Klim en Outdoorcentrum Yosemite
address: van der Heydenstraat 8, Zwolle, 8014 ZZ Netherlands
description: 16 meter height, 100+ routes, Indoor Klettersteig and much more!

name: Bergenshallen
description: High quality climbing gym. Vertical to steep. 25 lead routes from 6a-8b. Bouldering and campus climbing areas.

name: Lehmkuhlhallen
description: Wall, 15 metres; hydrolic wall that can be tilted; Bouldering cave.

name: Mørkvedhallen klatresenter
description: More than 2500 m2 climbing, bouldering, speedwall. Course centre, shop, cafe.

name: Slaktehallen Buldrorado
description: Bouldering room, 250 sq meters of fantastic bouldering room, walls for all kinds of boulders; campus and lounge; short distance from central bodø, drop-in hours are possible.

name: Hemsedal klatresenter
description: Hemsedal Fjellsport har tilbud for grupper og firmaer. Vi tilbyr klatre- og fjellaktiviter, aktiviteter i elva, teambuilding og gruppeaktiviteter. Opplegget tilpasses hver enkelt gruppe. Gruppestørrelse kan være fra 5 til 200 pers og aktiviteten kan gjøres der kunden ønsker.

name: Klatreverket
description: More than 2500m2 of climbing surface, of which 20% are dedicated to bouldering. There is also a climbing shop at Klatreverket with Norways biggest selection in topos. Klatreverket er Nordens desidert største klatresenter. Vi ligger ved Akerselva på Torshov i Oslo og har åpent hver bidige dag hele året! Klatreverket har klatring og buldring på absolutt alle nivåer, og tilbyr et stort utvalg av klatrekurs både inne og ute.

name: Kristiansund Klatresenter
description: Kristiansund Klatresenter har varierte muligheter for tauklatring på alle nivå. Her finner du en bred, 15 meter høy klatrevegg med vertikale og overhengende ruter med stor variasjon, 15 meter høy vegg som fyller internasjonale krav for speedklatring samt en 7 meter høy klatrevegg for nybegynnere og kursaktivitet. Senteret har også har et stort og variert buldreområde, inkludert en unik åpen bue man kan klatre under. På toppen av buen kan du ta en kopp kaffe og se utover all aktiviteten på senteret. Klatresenteret har også to Moonboard (25 og 40 grader) med app-tilkobling. Stort og moderne treningsareale. Rommet har varierte treningsapparater og -utstyr for både kondisjons- og styrketrening. Det finnes også et dedikert areal for barneaktivitet med mange forskjellige buldreproblemer.

name: Tyrili Klatring
description: Built in 2014, with a total of 1200 m2 of climbing surface. Extensive bouldering, about 25 anchors for lead climbing on 14,5m high walls. Top rope climbing on 9m high walls, separate bouldering area for kids. Seven auto belays. Small shop, hire available

name: Tyrili Klatring
description: Built in 2014, with a total of 1200 m2 of climbing surface. Extensive bouldering, about 25 anchors for lead climbing on 14,5m high walls. Top rope climbing on 9m high walls, separate bouldering area for kids. Seven auto belays. Small shop, hire available.

name: Vulkan Klatresenter
description: Senteret har tre ulike vegger, med 26 toppankere, med 2-3 ruter per linje. Her finner du klatring på alle nivåer; fra lettere ruter på vertikal vegg, til tunge og overhengende ruter. Senteret har tre ulike vegger, med til sammen 26 toppankere, med 2 til 3 klatreruter per linje.

name: Gekko Klatring
description: climbing gym is not too high, but nice routes and a boulder area.

name: Trondheim Klatresenter AS
description: The biggest bouldering center in Norway. Bouldering walls are 5m high. New problems ever so often. The center also has a rope wall of 8m height. We offer a range of climbing courses from beginners to advanced trad and rescue courses. Mountain guides can also be hired.

name: Centrum Wspinaczkowe Adrenalina
description: Panel główny: 16 metrów wysokości, 16 stanowisk wędkowych, 18 stanowisk do prowadzenia z dołem, 2 stanowiska automatyczne Perfect Descent Auto Belay. Bulderownia: 2 panele (parter poziom początkujący, piętro poziom zaawansowany) łącznie 20 dróg. Panel dziecięcy: Panel 8m, 6 stanowisk automatycznych Perfect Descent Auto Belay.

name: BlokFit
description: A modern boulder gym with more than 1000 m2, competition wall, training area, good cafeteria and bar, fireplace, barbecue, showers.

name: AntyGrawitacja
address: Wojciecha z Brudzewa 42, Kalisz, Wielkopolskie 62-800 Polska
description: Ściany o wysokość 11 metrów, ponad 1000 chwytów, bulderownia, kawiarnia, strefa relaksu.

name: Wall at the Academy of Physical Education (University)
description: ·ciana wspinaczkowa AWF Katowice

name: AVATAR
description: The biggest climbing wall in Cracow. More than 600 sq.m. Climbing wall - 12 m height. Good place for bouldering, big overhangs; slab walls, slack line. Visit our webpage! http://www.facebook.com/AvatarMyReality

name: Centrum Wspinaczkowe Forteca
description: Jedna z najwiêkszych sztucznych ocian w Polsce.

name: Centrum Wspinaczkowe Hutnik
description: 500m2 powierzchni wspinaczkowej pod go³ym niebem

name: Stratosfera
description: Ponad 500 m2 powierzchni wspinaczkowej z 40 stanowiskami asekuracyjnymi

name: Sport Poziom 450
description: Nowoczesna sala o wymiarach 16 x 12 m i wysokości 7 m przystosowana jest do prowadzenia grupowych zajęć ruchowych dla dzieci, młodzieży i dorosłych, w tym również do zajęć z nowoczesnych form fitness , zajęć tanecznych, zajęć ze sztuk walki. Sala posiada pełne zaplecze szatniowe i sanitarne, a duża ilość światła i bardzo dobra wentylacja mechaniczna zapewniają komfort zajęć.

name: Hala sportowa GOKSiR
description: Oferujemy sciane wspinaczkowa wysokosci 10 metrówz 14 drogami do asekuracji górnej i 6 drogami do prowadzeniaz dolna asekuracja o lacznej powierzchni 150m².

name: GEKO - Szczecinskie Centrum Wspinaczkowe
description: More than 250 square metres of climbing area including roof. Udostepniamy przeszlo 250 m kw. powierzchni do wspinania, kilka tysiecy chwytów przymocowanych do scianek oraz sprzet wspinaczkowy. Wystarczy przyjsc i przyniesc ze soba obuwie sportowe na zmiane. Drogi wspinaczkowe zaprojektowano z przeznaczeniem zarówno dla dzieci, osób poczatkujacych, jak i wytrawnych wspinaczy.

name: Arena Wspinaczkowa Makak
description: 19 meters high, 1000 square meters climbing area. 100 routes from 5 to 8a+ (French grades) up to 30 meters long.

name: BOS Strumykowa
description: 9m high TR and RP + bouldering panel frame.

name: Bulder Bar
description: Kameralna bulderownia, licząca 74m2 powierzchni. Duża ilość przewieszeń, ciekawa bryła, urozmaicony dach, campus HRT, to zalety ursynowskiej bulderowni. Niewątpliwym atutem jest bliskość stacji metra Imielin, znajdującej się w odległości 600m od naszej bulderowni. Całość stanowi interesujący punkt na mapie wpinaczkowej stolicy.

name: Centrum Wspinaczkowe Murall
description: Murall to największe i najnowocześniejsze centrum wspinaczkowe w Polsce. Ściana sportowa z autoasekuracją i mega boulder.Odwiedź nas i zacznij się wspinać!

name: Centrum Wspinania W Pionie
address: ul. Nowowiejska 37- ul. Hoza 29/31 m.90, Warszawa, Poland

name: Crux
description: Bouldering, different angles, roofs, slabs etc. + nice caffeteria

name: OnSight Centrum Wspinaczkowe
description: 400m2 climbing wall

name: Budynek Uniwersytetu Wroclawskiego
address: ul. Przybyszewskiego 63; Sciana wspinaczkowa ZERWA, Wroclaw, Karlowice Poland
description: Glówna czesc sciany to przewieszone pod róznymi katami plyty przechodzace w dach (8 metrów wysiegu). Obok znajduje sie pochyla scianka przeznaczona do nauki wspinaczki. Do uprawiania boulderingu, sluzy przewieszony trawers oraz mocno przewieszona (okolo 45 stopni) pochylnia, do której ostatnio dobudowano tzw. 'beczke' z dachem i zaokraglonym wyjsciem w przewieszenie. Ostatnio scianka zostala rozbudowana o dwa filary z wieloma nowymi drogami o róznych stopniach przewieszenia.

name: Elewator
description: Sciana Wspinaczkowa 'Elewator', Gdansk ul. Droszynskiego 15, tel. 058 5581403, wspinaczka dla poczatkujacych jak i zaawansowanych. Mamy ok. 250 m powierzchni do wspinania oraz 70 m boulderownie o róznym stopniu przewieszenia scian. Na duzej scianie (max wysokosc 19 m) wystepuja partie imitujace skale, czesci pologie, przewieszenia, zaciecia rysy, krawadki, dziurki oraz inne formacje. Na powierzchni sciany dokreconych jest kilka tysiecy chwytów, oferujace rózne stopnie trudnosci dróg wspinaczkowych – od latwych dla poczatkujacych wspinaczy po extremalnie trudnie.

name: Vertical nucleo de escaladada adr
address: Rua Eça de Queiroz Estômbar, Faro, Portugal
description: Núcleo de escalada de carácter lúdico-desportivo. 7-22 pm (apenas dias úteis)

name: Núcleo de Escalada e Montanhismo de Fermentelos
phone: Núcleo de Escalada e Montanhismo de Fermentelos
description: Pequena parede de Bouldering com cerca de 40m2 e 3 vias/tops.

name: Bloco Bouldering
description: Ginásio de Escalada Bouldering

name: Rocódromo do Areeiro
address: R. João da Silva 16B, Lisboa, Portugal
description: It is the cheapest and best rock climbing gym in Lisbon. Instalação desportiva preparada especificamente para praticar escalada.

name: Vertical Wall Climbing Gym
address: Rua Angola 2 Rua de Angola- Edifício Lobo- 1º Frente 2620-493 Olival Do Basto, Lisboa, Portugal
description: Situado em Olival do Basto, o Vertical Wall possui um espaço de 350 metros quadrados, onde se encontra o seu muro de escalada indoor com uma área escalável com cerca de 250 metros quadrados e altura máxima de 4.50 metros. No Vertical Wall o ambiente é descontraído e familiar, sem nunca faltar a atenção adequada dos membros da nossa equipa, que estão sempre dispostos a ajudar tanto aqueles que estão a iniciar como os que queiram evoluir e atingir objectivos concretos.

name: Clube de Escalada da Maia
address: Escola EB 2 - 3 da Maia, Maia, Portugal
description: Parede de bloco com 30 graus de inclinação e mais de 4 metros de largura e 3 de altura. Bloco e desportiva.

name: Clube de Escalada de Braga
address: Estádio 1º de Maio, N101 12; 4715-000, Braga, Portugal
description: Amateur Association from Braga about Climbing.

name: Escola Marista de Escalada - Boulder Spot
address: Av. dos Maristas 175, Parede, Carcavelos, 2775–243 Portugal
description: Parede de Escalada (6 vias/tops)e Sala de Boulder com 5 zonas.

name: SaoRock
description: O São Rock abre as portas na cidade do Porto para proporcionar a prática da escalada indoor a aqueles que buscam diversão através dos desafios característicos dessa modalidade, que se dá em ambiente seguro e controlado. Pode ser realizada desde os ‘miúdos’ até aos mais ‘graúdos’, sendo necessária apenas a vontade de se desafiar e divertir.

name: Climb Up
address: PortugalRua Nossa, Senhora da Conceição; Lisboa, 3 2790 - 111 Carnaxide

name: IN WALL - climbing center
description: Ginásio de escalada na cidade de Setúbal com bouldering e escalada desportiva! Para todas as idades!

name: Câmara Municipal de Tondela
address: R. Dr. Amadeu Ferraz de Carvalho, Tondela, Portugal
description: Pavilhão Municipal com estrutura artificial de escalada, com 8m de altura por 6 de largura, em madeira, com diversas inclinações. Utilizável apenas em horários destinados a entidades: Núcleo de Escalada da ACERT e Escola Secundária de Tondela

name: Higia Climbing
address: Rua Quinta de Vale Canas; Lote 6; 2560-254, Torres Vedras, Portugal
description: Espaço de escalada indoor.

name: Sala de sport-Scoala Darste
description: O sala mica de aprox 6/7m si un panou de aprox 3/6,5m alcatuit din trei 'felii', fiecare dintre acestea fiind frante la jumatate (cu balamale).

name: Natural High Brasov
description: Staff-ul foarte prietenos, probleme interesante, schimbate frecvent.

name: Galactic Indoor Climbing GYM
description: Suprafata catarabila - cea mai mare structura artificiala de escalada/boulder existenta la ora actuala in Romania - aprox. 327 metri patrati. description: Vertic Halle is not only the first climbing gym to be opened in the Valais but is also the biggest in western Switzerland. The gym also has a 180m2 bouldering area which is separated into two parts, one for adults with a height of 4,5meters and one for children up to 3 meters. Open year round we offer various activities, such as climbing lessons for both adults and children, birthday parties and competitions. Our qualified staff will be delighted to teach you in a fully secure environment. We can provide you with rental gear. For further info go to our rates section.

Anyone from beginner to pro will find something for him/her. Our friendly personnel consists of active sportsmen. We speak English

name: TheWall
description: Built in Lviv in 2015, The Wall is now the most modern climbing centre in Ukraine. It occupies a total area of ​​250 square meters, with 50 trails of varying difficulty. The Wall is equipped with abrasive coating and ultra-modern certified equipment from world leading manufacturers. The climbing center has several thematic zones, such as warm-up zone, bouldering zone, artificial rock for children and high-trail zone (up to 14 meters). The climbing centre offers personal and group lessons for adults and children, and the option of independent visits. The Wall employs professional trainers, including sportsmen who have won national and international competitions numerous times. Among these are experts with experience training Ukraine’s national team to participate in the World Cups. The trainers will develop individual schedule of classes for each client individually, helping to plan the load to maximize development. In order to develop this sport among the younger generation, in 2016, OKKO filling stations network formed a children’s climbing team, whose training base is “The Wall” and whose members represent Lviv at national and international competitions.

name: Fire Rock

description: Primarily a bouldering gym. Also a top-roping wall near the escalators, which isn't used much (so bring your own harnesses, friction device, and belaying partner). Enter the stadium's outdoor equipment shopping mall at the east side of the stadium (entry F, up a wide staircase by the Nike store) and head down the escalators, then turn left to reach the bouldering gym. Easily accessed from the Tiyuchang (Shaanxi Stadium) metro station exit A (Line 2). 80 yuan (cash, exact change recommended) per session in May 2017. They have a supply of climbing shoes, but not necessarily all (especially large) sizes. Routes/challenges are defined by users rather than colours or markings, and there's good camaraderie among climbers (no language needed). There are also various workout equipments in addition to the bouldering wall. A translation app is recommended for those who don't speak Mandarin. There's wi-fi, with the code on a column near the entrance. Washrooms are on the upper level, to the left from entrance F. (-Ryan Matthews, visiting Xi'an for May 2017 from Montréal, Canada)

address: Changle Road no.166 Holiday world building 7, xincheng, Xi'an, Shaanxi China

If you follow the directions to the Cinema, it will walk you by the gym. On the signs at the entrance this gym is listed under it's old name, 火石攀岩 or Fire Rock Climbing, but is under new ownership. There are 3 auto-belay systems and multiple top rope and lead climbing routes. All the top rope/lead climb routes are color coded by holds or taped. Climbing of all skill levels can be found here. Some of the staff speak excellent English. Cost of entry is 60 yuan if you bring your own harness and shoes, or 80 yuan total if you need to rent. The bouldering is good here. Only a few routes are color coded or taped in some way. They have an iPad that they let you use that has pictures displaying various routes.

description: U ROCK’s mission is to provide climbers of all ages a fun, safe environment to exercise, socialize, and gain new climbing skills. By focusing on these fundamental qualities, our friendly and knowledgeable team will create an environment that is as encouraging for first-time climbers, as challenging for the experienced climbers. U ROCK offers instructions, courses and programs for beginner and skilled climbers alike in a safe, professional, and fun environment. At U ROCK, we strive to build a strong community of people who share a common passion – CLIMBING. Your well-being is our top priority, therefore we will accurately keep an inspection schedule of all life-saving / support equipment. We believe that positive customer relations only contribute to growing a healthy climbing community. Our team will be respectful, prompt and honest in delivering service to all current and potential climbers. U ROCK is a unique place for guests and members: Top-roping, leading, competitions, sessions and courses, summer camps, birthday, team building, and much more activities will introduce hundreds of new people to the world of climbing. In 3 words: Live, Laugh, Climb!

description: The largest indoor climbing gym in Taiwan and has 16 meter indoor climbing gyms, over 780 square meters of artificial rock climbing surface, over 180 square meters of dedicated bouldering, and a full Pro-Shop.

name: STONE bouldering gym
address: No.58-12; Sanhe Rd; Xinzhuang Dist., New Taipei City, 242 Taiwan
description: Bouldering is free climbing in the space of 4 to 6 meters height. STONE bouldering gym is the biggest bouldering gym in Taiwan, we provide: - Continuous climbing face (which is unique in Taiwan) - Hundreds of well-set problems with different levels of difficulty - Safe and comfortable climbing area - Clean and wide resting area - Professional coaches in store everyday - Climbing shoes for renting - Free wifi STONE bouldering gym is the best choice for beginning and advanced climbers. With the protection of the pad and teaching of our coaches, you can climb freely and safely on the wall. Enjoy in the excitement of jumping down when finishing, and the self- fulfillment of clearing the problem you couldn't before. To complete a problem, you need not only strength, but also well body coordination, just like finding the solution of a puzzle. You can climb alone, you can also climb with your friends. Everyone can find some fun in the STONE bouldering gym. See website for business hours.

description: Urban Playground (UP) is a state of the art indoor climbing facility, located in the heart of Bangkok. We offer over 700 square meters of high quality climbing space, from bouldering walls to top-rope climbing to lead climbing. We cater to all levels of ability from first time climber to professionals. As part of the Racquet Club, we also offers access to tennis courts, badminton courts, swimming pools, a fitness center and much more. Our community is a dynamic and diverse group of people from all walks of life... with one goal in common, to have an active life style.

description: Welcome to CLYMB World, located adjacent to Yas Mall, Ferrari. Here is the world’s ultimate adventure hub that will revolutionize indoor skydiving and climbing. Housing the world’s biggest indoor skydiving flight chamber with a record breaking width of 32 feet and height of 104 feet, and the world’s tallest indoor climbing wall, measuring a mountainous 141 feet in height... Gear up to conquer two record-breaking experiences all under one roof.

name: Rock Republic
address: Dubai Investment Park 1, Dubai, United Arab Emirates
description: Bouldering facility in UAE. Walk-ins welcome; memberships available. Sales of climbing accessories. Over 400m2 of climbing, and a bouldering area of 215m2 with 40cm mats.  Boulder walls are 3.6 to 4.5m high with angles ranging from 85 degree slab through to overhangs of 2 - 3m and a 8m roof.

name: The Wall Dubai
address: SZR; the Apartments DWTC; Block-C, Dubai, UAE
description: The Wall Dubai was installed in 2009 and has had 1000’s and 1000’s of climbers/studen/youngsters through its doors. Its anchored at the back of Dubai World Trade Centre apartments, one of the most iconic and authentic buildings in Dubai left. It also boasts the first official IFSC 10 meter World Cup speed wall (standard) in the Middle East and is also the highest wall in UAE standing at 15 meters tall.

description: The indoor climbing gym is about 10-15 metres height, with vertical and gradually steeper routes and a cliff (acute angle!). Also, possible to climb without any holds (has little mounds in the wall)

name: Crescent Wall
address: Floor 5; Crescent Mall, Phu My Hung , District 7, Ho Chi Minh, Vietnam
description: Crescent Wall is Vietnam’s newest Premier Climbing Gym offering city dwellers the unique experience of “The Great Outdoors” Crescent Wall is housed in floors 4, 5 and 6 of Crescent Mall. With 16-meter floor to ceiling windows, providing air-conditioned, filtered air climbing comfort and panoramic views of the city. Crescent Wall’s 1,500 squared meters of wide ranging and challenging surfaces which promises to challenge everyone from the enthusiastic novice to the hardened progressive climber. Professional care and instruction is guaranteed to ensure a safe and memorable climbing experience.

Our 15-meter climbing wallhas a wide range of routes for all skill levels from beginners to advanced. We have 7 auto-belay devices and professional staff on hand to belay and ensure your fun and safety.

name: Vertical Academy
address: 18 Truc Duong, Thao Dien; D2, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam
description: Finest Indoor Climbing Gym 200 sq. m of top-rope and bouldering wall Open practice and climbing courses and events for kids / adults. Official and exclusive Petzl distributor for Viet Nam Pro / Safety at height training center

name: CityROCK Cape Town
address: 9 Milner Street; Paarden Eiland, Cape Town, South Africa
description: Located at Unit 5 Table Bay Industrial Park, South Africa's premium indoor climbing facility, our facilities include 158 Anchors for high wall climbing with hundreds of routes to climb. We have a large bouldering area (bouldering is climbing 3-4m high without a rope) We cater to many different audiences – from first-time kids to experienced outdoor climbers, and everyone in between. CityROCK is more than just a climbing gym, it is where like-minded people meet and share their passion for climbing. Our coffee shop area has a relaxed vibe and is the ideal place to meet friends, climbing partners and make plans for your next trip. Free Wi-Fi makes it a great spot to interact through your social media network, while having coffee, chatting, or browsing through climbing magazines and route guides.
